name: Brothers in Arms D-Day
description:
ON THE NIGHT BEFORE D-DAY, the 101st Airborne parachuted behind enemy lines in Normandy. The hopes of the free world rested upon their shoulders. As either Sgt. Matt Baker or Cpl. Joe Hartsock, lead your Screaming Eagles into the largest airborne invasion the world has ever known.
• True History: Fight your way through actual legendary battles of the 101st airborne campaign in Normandy.
• Intuitive and customized control system put you right in the thick of the battle.
• Cooperative gameplay via wireless (WLAN). Team up and share commands online. Mark objectives and use real tactic.
